p: Samples of frozen shoots (approximately 0.4 g of fresh weight) were ground in liquid nitrogen and homogenized in 2.0 mL of ice-cold 100 mM phosphate buffer containing 0.1 mM EDTA and 1.0% polyvinylpyrrolidone. The homogenate was centrifuged at 12,000× g for 20 min at 4 °C. The supernatant was used to analyze the activities of antioxidative enzymes and protein content.
